channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Add Comments
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Add Comments

item.title: CVE-2022-3909|2024-08-03T01:20:58.777Z -- unknown -- add%20comments
item.description: The Add Comments WordPress plugin through 1.0.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
